title: let's talk about it: nasus
body:
Come on, grasp of the undying+passive+nasus= stupid lifesteal 

wouldn't it be fair if lifesteal is removed from his passive to compensate? it's just too much as is.

replies.body: nasus is fine as is hes is the true juggernaut
I was playing AP MF top (before she was massively nerfed) and I was poking literally non-stop with autos and Make It Rain and Nasus was able to lifesteal through it all, it was so stupid.
